    @keyframes spin {
      0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
      100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
    }
    button:hover:not(:disabled) {
      opacity: 0.9;
      transform: translateY(-1px);
    }
    button:disabled {
      opacity: 0.5;
      cursor: not-allowed;
    }
